Posts.Content: Mar 13, 2009 03:19PM hoopsielv wrote: Hi Robin- I had a bilateral on March 3rd.  I have expanders put in.  I have no regrets so far, just a lot of relief that it's over!  Please let us know what you decide- whatever you do, you will find a lot of support here! Laurie
Posts.Title: Uni- or Bi-? robinjs19 robinjs19

Posts.Content: Mar 26, 2009 03:59PM hoopsielv wrote: I had a bilateral (with 3 nodes removed) and expanders placed at the same time.  My surgery was Tuesday morning and I went home Thursday afternoon.  I was doing really well.  My husband stayed with me at home on Friday.  I had two drains and the one seemed to be plugged; it never drained more than 5 ccs in 8 hours!  I was expecting to be in a lot more pain- I stopped the prescription painkillers in a week.
Posts.Title: How long was your Hosp stay for BLMas LynnVA NancyD
